name: boost-voronoi-wasm-module
description: A WASM module that uses Boost::Polygon::Voronoi to generate a voronoi diagram
author: gui2one

scripts.copy_files: cp build_wasm/boost_voronoi.wasm ./dist/build_wasm/boost_voronoi.wasm && cp build_wasm/boost_voronoi.js ./dist/build_wasm/boost_voronoi.js && cp build_wasm/boost_voronoi.d.ts ./dist/build_wasm/boost_voronoi.d.ts && cp index.html ./dist/index.html && cp js/test_module.js ./dist/js/test_module.js
